channel.title: Genetics on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Genetics on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Some AI tools don’t understand biology yet
item.description: A collection of new studies on gene activity show that AI tools aren’t very good.

item.title: Science Reveals the Surprising Origins of the Potato
item.description: Potatoes as we know them today are the product of a hybridization that took place 9 million years ago between two plants, one of which was an ancestor of the tomato.

item.title: Science Reveals the Surprising Origins of the Potato
item.description: Potatoes as we know them today are the product of a hybridization that took place 9 million years ago between two plants, one of which was an ancestor of the tomato.

item.title: DHS Faces New Pressure Over DNA Taken From Immigrant Children
item.description: The US government has added the DNA of approximately 133,000 migrant children and teens to a criminal database, which critics say could mean police treat them like suspects “indefinitely.”
